ValidationRule.description: As a Sales User, only the Revenue Start Date and Revenue End Date can be changed when the Opportunity associated with the Product is Closed Won. Also as per new changed validation rule - Sales users can change Quantity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Won"), OR( $Profile.Name = 'Coverage Sales', $Profile.Name = 'BG Base', $Profile.Name = 'Hub Users', $Profile.Name = 'Product Sales', $Profile.Name = 'Sales 3rd Party', $Profile.Name = 'SecurePay Super User', $Profile.Name = 'Solution Sales', $Profile.Name = 'Enterprise Onboarding', $Profile.Name = 'Customer Team', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Operations', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Operations Super User'), OR( ISCHANGED(UnitPrice), ISCHANGED(Quantity), ISCHANGED(Change_Classification__c), ISCHANGED(Contract_Product__c), ISCHANGED(Contract_Number__c), ISCHANGED(Off_the_shelf_check__c), ISCHANGED(Description)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change details of products when the opportunity has been closed-won
